Title: Relates to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the city, NYC department of education, NYC educational construction fund, NYC school construction authority and NYC housing authority
Summary: Relates to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the city, New York city department of education, New York city educational construction fund, New York city school construction authority and New York city housing authority; requires all disposition to be subject to New York city's uniform land use review procedure and requires prior notification and community consultation.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to the sale, lease or other disposition of property of the New York city department of education, New York city educational construction fund, New York city school construction authority, and New York city housing authority
